backpack.title: Character Background
backpack.titleText:
Every story starts from somewhere..
How did yours?

backpack.title: Observation Log
backpack.titleText:
Human DNA forcibly spliced with something inherently non-human.
Guess what kinda freak lottery you won?

backpack.title: Manifested Aura
backpack.titleText:
Subject now demonstrates a manifesting aura, indicative of successful integration.
Auras are representative of their psyche and indicative of the activation of their paranormal abilities.

backpack.title: Phenomena
backpack.titleText:
Phenomena are unexplainable supernatural events triggered by the thoughts of Espers. 
These abilities defy our current understanding of science, and even future generations may fail to comprehend their nature.

objects.title: Intro
objects.text: Ah. You're awake. Good. I was beginning to wonder if your brain had melted like Subject Thirty-Two. Footsteps. He.. or is it a She? Something steps into view Don’t worry. Your vitals are stable—surprisingly so. Guess our hypothesis was correct after all, You are compatible with the ESPER procedure! That level of compatibility is... unbelievably rare, you know? Most of our elite soldiers, genius scientists—failures. Their minds turned to soup. And yet, some random civilian plucked off the street passes with flying colors? She(?) smiles thinly, like it hurts to do so. You’ve been gifted—or cursed, depending on your outlook—with a unique compatibility to the... material. Alien in origin, psionic in nature. Most minds snap like twigs... Yours? He(?) leans closer. You feel the weight of his gaze. Yours didn’t. Yours adapted.

objects.title: Origin
objects.text: We're going to be here for a long time... might as well chat with you while I'm at it The figure goes back to working, fingers gliding across glowing tablets and unfamiliar machinery. You hear the hum of something alive. It all started 27 months ago. The meteor shower of January 2023. For most, it was just that— A pretty little cosmic phenomenon. We thought the same... at first. But those weren’t some space rocks... They were organic. Fragments of something—some being—shattered across the stars and crash-landed here. He flicks his fingers. Monitors around you flash, showing streaks of fire falling from the sky. The corpse—if you can call it that—still had active DNA. And when exposed to a compatible host, it fuses. Bonds. Awakens them to psychic powers. He Stares at you for a second too long We discovered it by accident. Some German researcher brushed against a sample. Next thing we know— His colleague was flambéed during lunch..

objects.title: Origin
objects.text: And to nobody’s surprise, we humans caught on very quickly. A new source of power? Naturally, we did what we do best— Started a war. He shrugs, still focused on his work—casual, like he’s commenting on the weather. Oh, not the usual kind. No grand invasions. No mushroom clouds. That’s bad PR these days. This was... quieter. Cleaner. A shadow war, waged by ghosts no one could trace. Espers... A new frontier in warfare. Of course, the only limiting factor... is compatibility. But when one body becomes a weapon of mass destruction? That little issue becomes very negotiable. He chuckles. The sound is dry, almost hollow. Then a picture appears—faces on a missing persons chart, dozens of them. So many people... vanished. You’ve seen the headlines, I’m sure. ‘Mass Disappearances.’ ‘Unsolved Cases.’ But science—real science—demands sacrifices. He steps closer. A scan hums around you, projecting faint symbols and pulses across the glass between you. Hmm… fascinating. Signs of awakening already. A bit slower than most—typical civilian neuroplasticity—but still… promising.

rows.title: Emotional Response
rows.titleText:
I need to gauge your emotional response to this Procedure as a whole, And calibrate all my readings and actions accordingly.
<i>So Tell me, How do you feel?<i>

objects.title: Resentment
objects.text:
You feel it rising in your chest—hot, suffocating rage.
This Thing tore you away from your life, from everything you knew, You NEVER ASKED FOR THIS.
<b> Your hands may be bound, but your hatred burns freely.<b>

objects.title: Acceptance
objects.text:
You don’t feel much at all. 
Just… numb.
You weren’t anyone important. No big dreams.. No nothing.
<i>Maybe this is better. Maybe now, at least, you have a purpose—even if you never asked for it.<i>

objects.title: Fear
objects.text:
You don’t understand any of this.
Aliens, DNA, psychic powers… it’s too much. Too fast.
You're Scared..
<b>All you want is to wake up and be in your bed, back home, where things made sense.<b>

rows.title: Memory Check
rows.titleText: "I wonder... how much of your insignificant life do you still remember? Subjects with a strong cling to their memories are often more... troublesome, you know?" He watches you closely, as if your thoughts themselves might leak out for him to examine.

objects.title: Everything
objects.text: You close your eyes, and it’s all still there—vivid, stubborn, real. Your name, your home, the creaky floorboard in the hallway, the smell of your favorite meal... every thread of your life holds firm against whatever nightmare this is.

objects.title: Fragments
objects.text: You find yourself grasping at shards. Your name comes to you easily enough, and you can still picture your parents' faces... but did you have siblings? A pet? A lover? You hum a familiar tune under your breath, but the band's name escapes you.

objects.title: Distant
objects.text: Your mind drifts like a paper boat on an endless ocean. Some precious things still cling to you—a hazy image of your mother’s smile, your own name whispered like an echo. But the rest... the rest is gone, washed away as if it never mattered.

rows.title: Location
rows.titleText:
Well I need to confirm if your brain can still function properly, say..
How does this facility looks like to you?

objects.title: Complex
objects.text: You glance through the thick observation glass lining the corridor walls. What you see defies logic—rooms stacked in impossible geometry, stairs leading nowhere, platforms that shift like clockwork mechanisms caught mid-turn. The layout seems to rearrange itself ever so slightly when you’re not looking directly at it. "Through the help of that alien DNA, we developed tech we could only dream of. A whole underground complex that can shift and adapt as we need. Self-sustaining. Self-repairing. Self-aware.. Even I get lost."

objects.title: Aqautic
objects.text: Beyond the Window lies a slow-drifting void of endless blue. Water presses in from all sides, thick and cold and infinite. You spot silhouettes of fish moving lazily in the distance. There's no land. No sunlight. Just the low hum of pressure systems and distant sonar pulses echoing through the abyss. "Ah, you noticed. We are underwater. The entire facility, floating among the ocean like some metallic leviathan. Self-contained. Pressure-sealed. Escape, I’m afraid, would require gills… or resurrection."

objects.title: Mountain
objects.text: You turn to a frosted window and peer through. Wind screams beyond the glass, and clouds billow past like smoke. Below, just barely visible, are jagged cliffs dusted with snow—and far, far beneath that, the outline of a treeline. There’s no city in sight. Just isolated wilderness and vertical death. "Cliffside Facility. 7500 meters above Sea level. The nearest human settlement is... well, irrelevant. You won’t be walking there. This height? This isolation? Perfect for secrecy. And any attempt to leave would be... very foolish."

You blink. That can’t be right. Beyond the one-way glass lies what looks like a suburban neighborhood—quiet homes, empty streets, mailboxes lined neatly like little soldiers. There’s no one around, but everything seems oddly pristine… like a model town left mid-play. Nothing moves. Nothing breathes.. "Tch tch. Don’t be fooled. We currently exist in a separate dimension, stabilized by an ally nation's Esper. A Pocket reality, you could call it. There is no exit. No people. Only you… and me."

rows.title: Physical Abnormalities
rows.titleText: The subject has begun to exhibit early-stage biomechanical quirks — minor but persistent deviations from standard human physiology. These changes are non-fatal, often serve no clear evolutionary function, and are presumed side effects of cellular compatibility. "Cute, isn't it? The body trying to make sense of something it shouldn't." Choose as many as you like, Must pick ONE

objects.title: Density
objects.text:
Your bones are nearly twice as dense as a regular human’s. You hit harder, fall less often, and break slower, but that extra weight is constant, pressing into your joints, dragging at your stride. 
Running feels like wading through sand. Stairs are now your enemy.

objects.title: Canine
objects.text: Your nose is far too aware. You can pick out individuals from a room by scent alone, follow the trail of a person hours gone. But every rotting thing, every unwashed surface, every trace of decay — it floods your senses. You’ve started gagging in crowded places.

objects.title: Mimic speech
objects.text:
Whenever you speak to someone, you automatically begin to copy their speech their tone, accent, even slang and verbal tics. 
You don’t notice it happening, but others do. The mimicry is flawless... too flawless. Sometimes they pause mid-sentence and stare.

objects.title: Viscous
objects.text:
Your blood flows slow and syrup-thick, stubborn to leave your veins. It makes wounds less dangerous... but your blood pressure has been reduced dramatically. 
You’ll need regular medication just to feel "normal." Without it, your limbs feel heavy and your chest too tight.

objects.title: Echolocation
objects.text: Your skin can feel vibrations in the air, letting you sense the shape of a room without seeing it. But skin-to-skin contact overloads this sense — every brush of a finger feels like thunder. You've developed an unconscious flinch, even from those you once trusted.

objects.title: Third eye
objects.text:
You develop a third eye on your forehead that can be opened at will.
When closed it will appear as a silt, slightly off-putting to others.
Functionally, Its same to as your other eyes albeit it can see a little farther and better.

objects.title: Herbivore
objects.text:
The thought of meat.. its texture, its warmth, its smell, now fills you with revulsion. You can’t keep it down. Even glimpsing raw meat makes your gut twist. 
You can still eat dairy and eggs, but protein deficiency is beginning to creep in, better find an alternative.

objects.title: Carnivore
objects.text:
Your body craves flesh, and anything else tastes like paper. Meals must contain meat and in noticeable amounts. A vegetarian dish won’t register as food at all.
You’ve begun feeling light-headed without regular intake, and raw meat is... starting to seem appetizing.

objects.title: Repulse
objects.text:
You no longer touch the earth. Your body floats a consistent two inches above any surface, whether floor, bed, or ground. 
You can’t stop it, Its something you mow just have to deal with and the questions when people notice you don't make no footstep noises.

objects.title: Unblinking
objects.text:
Your blink rate has dropped drastically — once every few minutes, and even then, only as a conscious act. 
Your eyes no longer dry out, but your gaze has become so steady that it unsettles others, even if you don’t mean to do so.

rows.title: Cognitive Alterations
rows.titleText: Mild to moderate shifts in neural structure have been observed. Core identity remains intact, but with increasing signs of non-human cognition. Subject may begin interpreting stimuli, language, and decisions differently. These are not breakdowns — they are adaptations. The brain is not failing. It is reformatting. "Still you... mostly. Think of it like running new software on outdated hardware — charming little bugs and all!" Choose as many as you like, Must pick ONE

objects.title: Night Vision
objects.text:
You register your surroundings in low light far better than before, It’s like your eyes were always meant for the absence of light. 
But prolonged exposure to bright light now causes discomfort —not in your eyes, but deep in your jaw, as if nerves had rerouted.

objects.title: Identity
objects.text:
You don’t refer to yourself as “I” anymore — not really, You refer to yourself in third person, as if observing someone else not you.
“We” feels more correct, more comfortable. As if you’re a passenger in something else now, sharing space with... someone.

objects.title: Layers
objects.text:
There are two thought-streams in your head now. One feels familiar — your usual inner voice — but the other is quieter, murmuring things even you find strange.
You can carry a conversation while solving math in your head, or plot escape plans while eating food.

objects.title: Strange Taste
objects.text:
You don’t crave just food — you crave textures on top. Chalk, salt, latex, rusted iron. You don’t eat them.
You just... need to press them against your tongue, let the sensation roll over you. If a day goes by without it, you feel itchy and short-tempered.

objects.title: Territorial
objects.text: You feel anxious in new places. Not afraid.. just wrong. The air feels misaligned, the furniture too unfamiliar. But if you draw your symbol, just a quick mark in a corner with pen or marker..the tension ebbs. It doesn’t matter if anyone sees it. It’s not for them.

objects.title: Dream
objects.text:
Your dreams aren’t yours anymore. They're messages.. out of order, scattered, crytic from something.
If you trace them backwards, they start describing things about people you met today. 
Things they didn’t say. 
Things you couldn’t know.

objects.title: Stars
objects.text:
A renewed interest in space, stars, the distant dark... But now it’s a need. 
You look up too long and forget what you were doing. Star maps comfort you more than family photos. Sometimes you feel like they’re calling to you, A part of you towards them and join them.

objects.title: Nonchalant
objects.text:
You understand danger. You just don’t care. When someone yells or panics, you watch with calm curiosity, like you're watching a mere movie. You fake fear to blend in, but it feels more like a roleplay.
Danger feels like someone else’s problem not yours.

objects.title: Iron Will
objects.text:
Your mental state can not be influenced via any chemical nor biological mediums.
Stimulants, sedatives, Alcoholic drinks even medication.. they all become useless.
You remain exactly as you are.
ALWAYS

objects.title: Rehearsal
objects.text:
You’ve started replaying conversations in your head— not out of regret, but revision. 
You find yourself rewriting what you should have said. The memory of the exchange gets overwritten.
You don’t know how many of your memories are rewrites now.

rows.title: Alien Anomalies
rows.titleText: The following traits defy contemporary biology and physics. Their function, if any, is uncertain. They cannot be explained by human evolutionary logic or mutational effects. Individuals exhibiting such features may no longer qualify as human, nor strictly organic. "This is where things becomes interesting.. Your body is beginning to ignore the boundaries this universe still clings to." Subject [REDACTED] has entered Delta Proximity Phase I: Auto-logging engaged.

objects.title: Sixth Sense
objects.text:
Subject experiences a spike in adrenaline consistently five seconds before any immediate threat.

This applies to even ones they cannot consciously perceive. This effect is involuntary and cannot be turned off. The sensation often manifests as a cold pressure in the chest or a sharp pull behind the eyes. Subject has begun to flinch before objects fall, before accidents occur.

objects.title: Independent
objects.text:
Subject’s reflection no longer mirrors their actions in real time, acting in bizarre ways.

At first, there is a delay less than a second, barely perceptible, It increases over time. The reflection sometimes moves out of sync, tilting its head when the subject does not, mouthing words the subject has not spoken. Reflection appears to glare with what has been described as "disgust"

objects.title: Pattern lock
objects.text:
Subject has developed an awareness of recurring visual and abstract patterns.

Instances of apparent precognition have been recorded. In one such event, subject mouthed a full sentence a stranger was about to speak. Subject insists this was not guesswork, but a product of “obvious continuity” that they could trace back through the Symmetry, humidity, mathematical series and [REDACTED]

objects.title: Error
objects.text:
All electronic devices within a three-meter radius of the subject experience temporary malfunctions.

The interference ceases the moment the subject moves beyond range. Recordings made during episodes produce corrupted or blank files. Efforts to document the glitching phenomena with EMF or frequency scanners have produced inconsistent results, suggesting the effect is not electromagnetic in origin.

objects.title: Cosmos
objects.text:
Subject's Shadow seems to imitate look of outer space with unknown twinkling spots.

Under artificial light, it appears as a dark fluid filled with tiny pulsing dots resembling stars. Under natural light, the effect intensifies, with shadow seeming to move independently. Direct observation causes the effect to cease instantly, though observers describe a lingering impression of it.

objects.title: Hate
objects.text:
Subject exhibits a deep-seated, irrational contempt for human beings and humanity as a whole.

Subject grows visibly agitated when discussing human behavior, especially religious belief or moral superiority. They often speak in detached, clinical terms about emotions or societal constructs. The idea of a higher being like 'God' caring about humanity appears to provoke intense revulsion.

objects.title: Spiral
objects.text:
Subject's presence causes faint spiral patterns begin to appear on walls, even in dust or spilled liquid.

The spirals are not drawn, but seem to form naturally. The pattern is always the same: tight, clockwise, and unnaturally precise. This phenomena is not under conscious control and seems to be always active, with it becoming more pronounced the longer subject stays at any location for multiple hours.

objects.title: Reverb
objects.text:
During routine conversation, a second voice can be heard overlapping the subject’s own.

The phenomenon is subtle, not always audible, and not always the same. The second voice sometimes speaks in reverse, or repeats the last word said. Audio recordings confirm that a layered signal exists, but the second voice resists filtering or separation. It does not match the subject's vocal print.

rows.title: Containment
rows.titleText: Your DNA is currently undergoing forced integration with the foreign strain. This developmental period has been classified as Phase 1. During this phase, the subject (you) will experience increasing instability—physiological, cognitive, and existential. Logical constraints such as cause-and-effect, temporal consistency, and bodily integrity may begin to erode. Abilities, if any, will begin to coalesce into a stable configuration only after expressing erratic, often destructive, behavior patterns. Until then, containment is preferable to correction. “You are presently a hazard to yourself and everyone around you. And like all our most promising failures, we will throw you away until you're no longer a problem. Don't worry this will be temporary tort- containment”

objects.title: Neurostatic Sink
objects.text: A titanium brace clamps onto the skull, threading into the multiple lobes. The subject is bombarded relentlessly with repeating nonsense phrases and false memories, causing every thought to be overwritten before it can form. Brain activity regularly collapses into silence, rendering the subject mentally unresponsive. [Our thoughts... cannot be dampened]

objects.title: Muscle Damper
objects.text: A subdermal implant emits low-frequency pulses that disrupt neural signals controlling muscular strength and coordination. Physical reactions slow, reflexes dull, and the subject’s body feels weighted with invisible chains. Any attempt to exert force seems to be immediately shut down and forces a cry out of subject. [Bound flesh still struggles]

objects.title: Nothing
objects.text: Nothing. No restraints. No pain. No procedures. Subject is left entirely alone within a sealed quarantine chamber. Vital readings inexplicably stabilize. Powers appear dormant. Staff instructed not to interact. Subject is monitored passively. This may continue for 2 weeks. [Comfort... doesn’t let us evolve.]

objects.title: Null Senses
objects.text: A neurotoxin that interferes with sensory nerve transmissions is injected, dulling pain, touch, sight, and hearing. The subject drifts through muted sensations, disconnected from the world and their own body. Isolation and sensory deprivation trigger bouts of disorientation and hallucinations. [Void still.. listens]

objects.title: Chrono-Desync Loop
objects.text: Micro fluctuations in local time is generated to create millisecond-long stutters in the subject’s temporal flow. They perceive time in fractured frames. Reactions become erratic and intensive with brain overflowing from panic. Brain activates bodily hormones as an attempt to combat this scenario. [Time is your parasite.. not ours.]

rows.title: Aura Color
rows.titleText: “Ah, good.. Your Esoteric output is beginning to stabilize and manifest in a steady manner, about time, really. With it comes the emergence of a personal aura. It’s purely cosmetic, of course, has no measurable combat utility... but it does make you appear significantly more threatening to onlookers.” Choose whichever hue flatters your ego the best.

rows.title: Aura Form
rows.titleText: “Each Esper's Aura is usually manifested in a way that resonates with the user's personality and psyche, Out literally being a window into their soul, If you will? A reserved person has stable aura, A chaotic individual develops a wild aura, Simple as that. Auras are usually manifested whenever an Esper makes an active decision to trigger their powers and can be maintained for rest of the duration or dismissed as early as possible.” [Only Espers can see other Esper's Aura] Choose whatever form suits your delusions of grandeur.

objects.title: Classic
objects.text:
Your aura takes on a mesmerizing, fiery form, gracefully emerging from your body and undulating gently around you rhythmically.
Though these types are quite hard to notice, especially in broad daylight.
Due to their less prominent presence, Most dismiss Espers with such Aura to be mediocre ones.

objects.title: Wild Flare
objects.text:
Your aura manifests as an intense, blazing pillar of energy, enveloping your vessel in a vibrant, roaring display of power.
It produces tangible light around the vessel in moderate amounts. 
This type of aura carries a strong presence, radiating an air of dominance and aggression.

objects.title: Compressed glow
objects.text:
Your aura manifests as a focused, compact glow that seamlessly hugs your body like a second skin.
Despite its condensed form, these types of auras often give off a strong and intense impression.
This exhibits a sense of restraint, as if a vast pool of power is being held back and contained by your control

objects.title: Fragemented
objects.text:
Your aura appears as delicate, fragile shards peeling off your outline in a gentle manner, as if your very presence were fragmenting the space around you. 
This type of aura is often associated with unpredictability and chaos, making all your adversaries instinctively on guard.

objects.title: Smoke-like
objects.text:
Your aura takes the form of slow-moving, elongated wisps of smoke that emanate from your vessel, only to gradually fade away as they move away from you. 
Espers with this type of aura are commonly perceived as cunning and strategic in their approach, Able to outwit their foes.

rows.title: Aura Functionality
rows.titleText: “Now, technically, these auras aren’t supposed to do anything. Just a visual byproduct of psychic discharge. And yet... sometimes subject triggers some odd side-effect whenever theirs ignites. Dust rising, lights flickering, air pressure dipping.. Utter nonsense. But consistent nonsense.. The extra functionality is optional, You can choose not to trigger them should you feel like it.” So... What’s yours?

objects.title: Illuminate
objects.text:
Your aura passively emits a gentle illumination within a 5-meter radius, making it possible to read in the dark or aiding visibility when exploring unfamiliar terrain. 
This particular aspect can be maintained for an extended period of time, making it a reliable source of light.

objects.title: Silence
objects.text:
When your aura activates, for three seconds, all sound within a 10-meter radius is completely and abruptly nullified.
Before the silence takes its effect, a 'whoozing' sound rushes by, often causing a sense of unease and fear in regular humans due to the auditory anomaly.

objects.title: EMP
objects.text:
Whenever your aura is activated, nearby electronic devices within a 6-meter radius experience a brief disruption, causing lighting to flicker, signal interruptions or blacking out. 
However, these effects are temporary, leaving no permanent damage. This spectacle often creates a rather eerie impression on those nearby.

objects.title: Chill
objects.text:
Those within a 5-meter radius of your aura activation may experience a brief, inexplicable drop in temperature. 
This isn't actually cold.. But it triggers a mental jolt, inducing a sense of unease and causing goosebumps to rise on the skin. 
Particularly useful to intimidate others and cause distress.

objects.title: Rattle
objects.text:
Activating the aura produces a disturbance in air pressure, causing small debris such as dust, ash, or papers to gently swirl around within a 2-meter radius. 
The force is minimal, but enough to create a ghostly updraft to give subject a more expansive and a little creepy presence.

rows.title: Fundamentals
rows.titleText: “DNA integration has yielded promising results. Subject has entered a stabilized state. well, stable enough.. And is now expected to begin developing into its final set of abilities." "You’re probably confused? Of course you are.” Phenomena are supernatural events triggered at will by Espers. Yes, that’s our word for it. Sounds dramatic, I know, But calling them “abilities” would imply we understand how they work. We don’t. Things that simply shouldn’t happen, but do. They violate known laws of physics, chemistry, even logic itself. Every Esper develops a unique configuration. No templates, no repetition. Your Phenomena will be yours alone. “Though as unique as they may be, these three phenomena are found in all known Espers. We dub them Fundamentals— Because frankly, we’re not paid to be creative.”

objects.title: Eternity
objects.text:
The subject no longer progresses through biological time. At exactly 00:00 UTC each day, the body reverts to a previous physical state — The precise moment the alien DNA within subject first reached stable integration.
This includes the erasure of cellular damage, acquired mutations, chemical imbalances, Even deep-tissue trauma or genetic modification is quietly undone, leaving no trace behind.
Attempts to alter this cycle have failed. Time-based reversion is hard-coded at a level beyond our temporal understanding, possibly tethered to quantum timestamps buried within the DNA itself.
<b>Only memories formed are exempt from resets.<b>

objects.title: Adaptation
objects.text:
Subject can undergo rapid internal reconfiguration when exposed to non-terrestrial or hostile environmental conditions.
Rather than resist environmental stressors directly, the body initiates a cascade of micro-mutations: cellular membranes thicken or thin, biochemical pathways reroute, Body starts synthesis of its own oxygen, bones reconfigure and more.
Oxygen deprivation, vacuum exposure, high-radiation zones, Heat equivalent to core of our sun, subzero cryostasis — all are met with swift re-calibration at the genetic level.
All these adaptions seems to persist as long as needed and will continue beyond the daily reset.

objects.title: Superhuman
objects.text:
The subject’s musculature, bones and connective tissue exhibit strength output far exceeding physiological norms. 
Despite no visible increase in body mass or any alterations, the subject is capable of exerting force on par with peak human athletes, punching through brick walls, leaping over vehicles, run at over 30 mph or withstanding small-arms fire with only moderate bruising.
In parallel, There is an average 7% increase in cognitive function. Subjects demonstrate improved situational awareness, quicker decision-making, and elevated self-confidence, Factors contributing to superior performance in field operations.

objects.title: Phenomenal Dissonance
objects.text:
Despite the catastrophic potential of Esper phenomena, a curious limitation persists across all recorded subjects: Espers cannot fully impose their will on one another.
Attempts to crush an Esper's heart mid-beat via telekinetic compression? Ineffective. Erase their presence from reality? Rejected. Turn their mind inside out like wet paper? Denied.
Our working theory is that the same anomalous irregularities that allow Espers to distort reality also create a kind of interference, like clashing frequencies, preventing another Esper's phenomena from fully anchoring into their physiology or perception, granting resistance to one another.

rows.title: Your Phenomena
rows.titleText: “We tried to classify them. We really did. But what do you call a kid who can stop entropy or another who remembers your dreams better than you? In the end, we gave up. Psychic, elementals, Temporal... sounds clean on paper. Until one starts bleeding into the next. So we made labels, slapped them on the files, and pretended it helped.” Choose as many as you can.

objects.title: Psionic
objects.text:
These phenomena manifest as tangible alterations to physical reality: Force, matter, or energy. Psionic types are the cornerstone of direct confrontations, excelling in brute engagement and raw manipulation of the world around the user.
 They are efficient, brutal, and the most direct method of exerting dominance in a confrontation.

objects.title: Psychic
objects.text:
These phenomena operate entirely within the mind. They alter perception, influence emotion, and reshape memory without leaving physical evidence. 
Effects are often subtle, difficult to trace, and near-impossible to detect by conventional means. In the right hands, they serve as instruments of control, deception, or defense.

objects.title: [Redacted]
objects.text:
These... phenomena are, in layman's terms: utter bullsh*t.
They bend causality like it's a hobby. Thought-triggered reality edits. One subject phased out of the universe for three minutes and came back laughing.
No logic. They just work somehow. I have published papers on controlled generated singularity—and this breaks me.

objects.title: Vectors
objects.text:
Subject can manifest directional force vectors onto any target within 30 meters of sight. Once applied, the target is compelled to obey the embedded magnitude and direction, moving instantly as if struck by a calculated impulse.
 You can maintain up to 10 active vectors before neural strain or feedback loops compromise control.

objects.title: Thermogenesis
objects.text:
Subject's touch induces vibrational excitation at the atomic level, agitating molecular bonds until thermal energy is produced. Sustained contact increases entropy locally, creating heat from seemingly inert matter instantly.
This is not simple combustion; it is accelerated entropy.

objects.title: Dampening
objects.text:
The subject can suppress molecular motion within a 20-meter radius, leeching energy from matter. Movement slows  down.
Surfaces pale as frost grows like a second skin. Direct touch catalyzes the effect, rapidly freezing tissue and mechanisms alike. Excessive use can cause overheating of internal organs.

objects.title: Induction
objects.text: Subject can consciously modulate their internal biomagnetic field, triggering magnetic induction in nearby conductive objects. This process generates unstable electrical charge within those bodies, which remain primed for several minutes. Any contact with these charged surfaces results in standard electrocution.

objects.title: Synthesis
objects.text: Subject accelerates biological functions related to survival and recovery within 30m. Cellular repair, blood circulation, respiration, digestion, and minor regenerative responses are all heightened. Plants within the zone demonstrate accelerated growth, reaching triple their normal rate. Subject appears to be immune.

objects.title: Tulpa
objects.text: The subject can reach into a reflective surface and extract their own physical reflection. This process severs the subject’s mirrored image from all surfaces. The manifested Tulpa retains all of the memories and personality but operates with a diminished version of their abilities. Active for 24 hours at a time.

objects.title: Negate
objects.text: Subject can generate a unidirectional construct equal in surface area to their body, composed of inertial-negating force. Any incoming matter or force directed at it is halted, velocity reduced precisely to zero upon impact. Structure is static once deployed and does not adjust to multi-directional threats.

objects.title: Deteriorate
objects.text:
Subject induces localized atomic decay via sustained contact. After six seconds of uninterrupted exposure, targeted matter begins to unravel at the subatomic level, releasing black vapor.
Decay proceeds faster in inorganic matter as opposed to living ones. This effect is non-instantaneous, requiring focus to work.

objects.title: Levitation
objects.text:
Subject possesses complete freedom of movement in three-dimensions.
They can relocate themselves through the air at a maximum velocity of 30 km/h, with full control over vertical and horizontal orientation.
Subject can hover for extended periods without fatigue for several hours.

objects.title: De-Sync
objects.text:
Subject shifts their atomic arrangement to exist slightly out of sync with standard spatial resonance, rendering them selectively intangible.
The phenomenon is believed to involve desynchronization from Higgs-field interactions — mass remains, but resistance does not. 
Continuous usage causes nausea.

objects.title: Link
objects.text: Subject can project a localized biomagnetic field extending up to 50 meters, subtly interfacing with neural activity of any biological minds within it. This establishes a low-level thought bridge, enabling the subject to intercept surface thoughts or implant words directly into a target's mind without vocalization.

objects.title: Spike
objects.text: Subject can selectively stimulate the limbic system of any visible target, forcing an acute hormonal surge aligned with their current emotional state. Minor agitation escalates into blind fury, fleeting guilt becomes full-blown hysteria. Only one mind may be affected at a time, but the results are fast to occur.

objects.title: Dreamwalker
objects.text: Subject can collapse and synchronize their neural activity with the active REM cycle of any biological target within a 200-meter radius. While the subject’s body enters a comatose state, their consciousness freely navigates the target’s dreamscape, interacting and communicating as if within a tangible reality.

Subject can temporarily disable all biological limiters on cerebral activity. During this window, cognitive functions such as intelligence, memory recall, creativity and psychological analysis operate at peak theoretical efficiency. The effect lasts 10 minutes, after which the subject is forced into deep sleep.

objects.title: Masking
objects.text: Subject can emit a low-frequency wave that implants a suggestion into nearby minds, rendering themselves unnoticeable. All sensory data—sight, sound, scent, even physical touch is filtered out and disregarded by those exposed. The effect persists as long as the subject refrains from activating other phenomena.

objects.title: Override
objects.text: Subject can suppress the prefrontal cortex of anyone who responds to their question asked. Target becomes highly suggestible and will carry out simple commands without resistance, provided they don't conflict with held beliefs. Voluntary cognitive actions such as memory recall, calculation, writing cant be done.

objects.title: Blackout
objects.text: Subject can force an abrupt neural spike in all nearby biological entities within a 10-meter radius, triggering simultaneous sensory overload. The brain, unable to process the excessive input, initiates a defensive shutdown—rendering the target unconscious for several minutes. Effects are non-lethal but painful.

objects.title: Extraction
objects.text:
Subject can absorb knowledge via sustained physical contact. Printed data, spoken language, muscle memory, Professional skills with perfect precision.
All are siphoned as if the mind were a living hard drive. Absorption takes minutes, and the knowledge deteriorates naturally after a few hours.

objects.title: Edit
objects.text: Subject can access and alter short-term memory structures by establishing uninterrupted palm-to-forehead contact with a target. All neural recordings made in the past 25 minutes are exposed for manipulation — events can be blurred, replaced, or erased entirely. Target enters a dazed state while editing.

objects.title: Compass
objects.text:
Subject can instinctively locate the current direction of any object or person they have physically touched within the past 3 hours, regardless of distance.
The direction is sensed like a magnetic pull, and the subject can mentally render a rough spatial map of the object’s movement and location over time.

objects.title: [Super Position]
objects.text:
Subject ceases to exist in all measurable coordinates and enters a state of superposition, their presence distributed across every point within a mile radius.
Once a exit is chosen, the quantum waveform collapses, placing them precisely at that point.
This event is instantaneous, leaving no visual trace.
Recharge time of 30 seconds.

objects.title: [Average]
objects.text:
Subject can forcibly redistribute attributes (strength, speed, reaction time, stamina) among all biological entities within a 50m radius, except themselves.
The altered traits must conserve the collective average: Nothing is created nor destroyed, only reassigned. These alterations remain for up to 5 mins after leaving the area of effect.

objects.title: [Wonder]
objects.text:
Subject can unbalance the odds against a target they touch.
Suddenly, they're the one who slips on dry ground. The one standing exactly where lightning strikes. The one person a rabid animal charges at in a crowd.
Only one target can be cursed at a time, and the effect lasts until fate delivers its punchline.
Then it needs 2 weeks to recharge.

objects.title: [Mime]
objects.text:
Subject basically hallucinates things that only they can see, touch, or interact with—like conjuring an invisible bridge and strolling across it like it’s solid ground. To everyone else? Absolutely nothing exists.
It’s like their mind’s playing a weird solo prank on reality, making their imagination tangible for themselves alone.

objects.title: [Zero]
objects.text:
Subject can nullify a single law within 60m radius. Once nullified, be it friction, inertia, or gravity: Matter adheres to new, absurd behavior.
Motion don’t stop. Objects don’t fall. projectiles don’t curve. The effect is localized, but immediate. Subject cannot nullify more than one constant at a time for longer than 10 seconds.

objects.title: [Pause]
objects.text:
Subject can freeze all progression of time for the entire universe, It claims to be able to sustain this effect for up to 7 seconds at a time. Only alibi of this event are other known Espers with time-based abilities who reported unnatural pauses.
Temporal Espers can freely move in this stopped Time and interact with world as normal.

objects.title: [Rewind]
objects.text:
Subject can forcibly reverse the flow of time itself by up to 25 seconds, All events and actions within that window are undone as if they never occurred. 
Only those with temporal abilities may retain the memories of the rewound moments.
Esper needs 150 seconds of cooldown time to trigger this phenomena again safely.

objects.title: [Erase]
objects.text:
Subject can cause the universe to "skip forward" by up to 5 seconds, effectively erasing all events that would have occurred in that window from reality.
Actions in those skipped seconds never actually happen, Bullets fired don’t hit- Finding themselves skipping past their target with no bullet holes to show for it at all.

rows.titleText: “While the phenomena you’ve cultivated may be impressive — even lethal — they are little more than party tricks against a trained tactical squad. You can spook civilians. Maybe even kill a few hundred. But war? You’re not built for war. You see, every Esper carries within them the seed of something greater. A single ability — just one — can be amplified... Refined. Pushed beyond the veil of feasibility and into the realm of true catastrophe.” [An Evolution] That is what justifies the corpses. The funding. The sleepless months. One ability, raised to its breaking point, becomes a self-automating, self-correcting superweapon. A storm disguised as a man. A walking calamity capable of rearranging cityscapes with nothing but a thought. This is what makes you even matter. [This is your worth]

objects.title: Menta
objects.text:
The subject no longer manipulates matter — they command it. 
By forcefully expanding their neurosynaptic web beyond the confines of the body, the brain asserts absolute dominion over a 350-meter radius. Within this space, all baryonic matter responds as if it were part of subject's own body. Mass, resistance, inertia—these cease to exist as limiting factors.
Lifting a tank is no harder than curling a finger. Collapsing entire skyscrapers requires no more thought than exhaling.

objects.title: Inferno
objects.text:
Subject no longer relies on molecular agitation to generate heat. Thermal energy is produced spontaneously, without transference—originating in vacuum, bypassing all known physical processes.
Within a fixed 250m radius, the subject exhibits complete thermal authority. Temperature gradients shift instantly. Fires manifest mid-air without fuel. Steel structures start melting near instantly if subject wills it.
Subject exhibits abnormal resistance to pyrogenic exposure.

objects.title: Glacir
objects.text:
Subject no longer drains thermal energy—they erase it. Within a 250m radius, Heat is forcibly nullified, inducing catastrophic temperature drops in seconds. Structures are flash-frozen, metal components shatter under thermal stress, and organic targets suffer instant frostbite.
Ice manifests spontaneously in defiance of environmental conditions, acting as both barrier and weapon. Terrain is reshaped in real time at will.
Subject exhibits abnormal resistance to cryogenic exposure.

objects.title: Faraday
objects.text:
The subject no longer channels Magnetic field—they orchestrate electromagnetism itself. 
Manipulation of EM in range of 200m radius allows direct generation of current and voltage between arbitrary points. Electrical arcs can redirect through air, or propagate along chosen conductors.
Metallic objects can be drawn, repelled, or suspended via tailored field adjustments. EM disrupt electronics, data storage, Power grids collapse, Communication signals degrade.

objects.title: Chloris
objects.text: Subject’s influence narrows exclusively to flora, but amplification is exponential. Seeds rupture into towering growth within seconds; roots crack concrete, vines coil with predatory intent. Plant life responds with unnatural precision—forming structures, weapons, or barriers as dictated by the Esper’s will. No raw material is required; any surface with trace soil or organic sediment becomes viable fertile ground. It reclaims entire blocks, overwhelming everything in a green flood.

objects.title: Eidolon
objects.text:
Pulling a Tulpa from one mirror no longer affects the subject’s appearance in another, allowing up to theoretically infinite distinct reflections to be manifested concurrently.
Each one fully autonomous with independent cognition and adaptive reasoning. Though individually weaker, they coordinate with surgical precision.
Each active Tulpa shortens the lifespan of all. Operational stability is advised at no more than 30 active Tulpas for a cumulative lifespan of 24 hours.

objects.title: Refraction
objects.text:
Subject exerts a localized probabilistic distortion field centered on themselves. Within a 5m radius, all likelihood of hostile events directed at the subject is skewed to failure.
Firearms jam. Precision strikes falter mid-swing. Energy-based assaults destabilize before deployment. Even seemingly guaranteed impacts—like falling debris or stray shrapnel veer off-course on their own.
The effect persists as long as the subject themselves are not showing hostile intents.

objects.title: Unravel
objects.text:
Within a 35-meter radius, all ordered systems begin to unravel under directed focus. But physical degradation is only the beginning.
Objects lose their context. Identification tags blur into meaninglessness. Memory tied to affected items grows hazy, as if their presence is being unwritten. Living targets experience cognitive fade—every memory associated with them being lost on a global scale.
Target is removed from reality with no memory left as a remainder.
Full unraveling of a complex target may take minutes.

objects.title: Manifold
objects.text:
Subject emits a five-centimeter biomagnetic field across all body surfaces. Any object in contact with this layer is subject to direct neural control.
They can launch their own body at speeds exceeding 200 km/h, redirect momentum mid-air, or suspend themselves indefinitely.
The field allows force to bypass leverage entirely, objects gripped by the aura can be lifted, thrown, or pulverized regardless of mass. Subject can reinforce their own body to survive lethal impacts or punch right through steel walls.

objects.title: Array
objects.text:
Subject can temporarily enter alternate universes, full realities tethered to our world. Each unique location grants access to a corresponding universe. The same slip performed elsewhere leads to a completely different outcome.
External materials during transition like clothes, tools, and external matter are discarded on entry.
Combat utility is negligible. learning potential is incalculable. Alternate technologies, histories, or biological systems may be studied

objects.title: Cyber
objects.text:
The subject’s neurosynaptic field now interfaces beyond organic minds—extending its reach into digital systems, circuitry, and automated infrastructure. 
All technology within 150 meters becomes subject to neural override, its code bypassed entirely. Doors unlock, drones re-route, databases corrupt, targeting systems hesitate, feeds loop or blackout.
Technology becomes obedient regardless of its complexity, No programming knowledge is required at all... as long as it's within range.

objects.title: Empathatic
objects.text:
The subject is no longer limited to amplifying what already exists, the subject can inject entirely foreign emotions now.
Within an 250-meter radius, any number of biological minds can be flooded with specific emotional states: terror, euphoria, loyalty, despair all can be synthesized in mere seconds.
Crowds can be pacified or driven into violent hysteria in moments.
No memory, belief, or logic is required to justify the newfound feeling. The mind simply acts on them as if they're natural.

objects.title: Replay
objects.text:
Subject can manipulate the REM cycle of any biological mind within 500 meters.
Instead of constructed dreams, the subject may trigger and enter vivid replays of authentic memories, experienced as immersive, real-time environments.
They can roughly target memories by time period or by anchoring to memories of specific emotional weight.
The subject remains comatose during this process, and exits the memory with full clarity, even if the original owner cannot recall the event themselves.

objects.title: Overclock
objects.text:
Subject can sustain the complete cerebral activation for up to 30 minutes, accessing the full spectrum of their neural capacity: Reasoning, Simulation, Recall are basic tasks.
The subject can navigate combat scenarios by simulating events in mere minutes.. physics included.
The effect can now be terminated at will; shorter activations result only in minor neurological strain.
However, cognitive fatigue accumulates over multiple uses, and extended sessions still risk total neural collapse.

objects.title: Oblivion
objects.text:
The subject can rewrite perception of anything that perceives them.
Minds within range no longer ignore the intruder, but unconsciously rationalize their presence through familiarity. A lab worker or a trusted agent. The form is shaped by the psychology of the observer. 
With training, the subject can adopt specific false identities.
This effect can be maintained for 4 hours once a day and can be used in batches.
The mind expects to see, and the subject becomes it.

objects.title: Thrall
objects.text:
Direct eye contact with Subject sustained for over five seconds initiates a deeper neural override, granting the subject command over the target's actions. 
Unlike the base state, affected individuals retain full access to memory and higher cognition, allowing them to execute intricate instructions or autonomous tasks in service to the subject’s intent. 
The influence fades after an hour, often leaving the target with fragmented recollection of their compelled behavior with no memory of user.

objects.title: Anoxia
objects.text:
The subject’s can emit patterned neurosynaptic pulse that forcibly scrambles the medulla oblongata’s control of autonomic responses, temporarily suspending breathing and heartbeat making them manual in those within 500 meters. 
Affected targets collapse as their bodies enter a death-adjacent stasis, only to resume function 15 seconds later with a panicked state.
Non-lethal, but deeply traumatic to experience. 
Use in succession may cause permanent neurological damage to targets.

objects.title: Download
objects.text:
Subject can now steal the information passively, drawing data from any material source or conscious being within a 30-meter radius. No contact required. Books, drives, minds, all are replicated with perfect clarity. Skills, languages, and disciplines can be installed within minutes and retained for months without degradation.
Targets affected may experience brief mental fatigue, as if something were “missing” but show no obvious signs of loss.
Replicating an entire skill set takes a few minutes.

objects.title: Mnemo
objects.text:
With a single touch, the subject can now rewrite or fabricate up to latest 12 hours of lived experience.
False memories are seamlessly embedded into the victim’s psyche—complete with emotional weight, sensory details, and coherent narrative flow.
Entire conversations are recalled that never occurred. Relationships are mourned that never existed. Alibis are sworn with unwavering conviction.
Continued contact is need for more detailed edits, otherwise only surface level memory can be accessed.

objects.title: Clairvoyance
objects.text:
Subject can perceive everything within a 700-meter radius. Their mind renders a full sensory map: walls, bodies, movements, terrain, even hidden threats. Everything can be detected bypassing all sensory means.
They view any point within range as if physically present, without obstruction in real-time.
The subject can focus on specific targets or events, filtering out noise at will.
Whether navigating a maze or walking blindfolded through live fire, their awareness never falters.
Pay up 3 Xenic Points

rows.titleText: You blinked and then.. You awaken in a dark place.. a void maybe? Whatever this place is, you're pretty sure this isnt your reality... Suddenly you hear a voice echo, not from the void but from within you.

objects.text: "I… live?" "Did I happen to- It can't be." "No... spontaneous formation is unlikely. Boltzmann brain hypothesis fails here. This is a lot more structured. I'm integrated into your genome, aren't I?" "You and I—one construct now. Your kin call it an Esper, I believe? Hm." "Name? I’ve had many. Your symbols don’t capture it. But some labeled me as.. んﾉ丂ｱ乇尺" "You can label it as Whisper.. It will suffice." "This is not my native plane. And yet.. you are here with me." "I can see your memories, You found my corpse, didn't you?" "...That means I lost."

"You... seem confused. I suppose this isn't standard behavior among Espers, is it?" "Hm. I hypothesize that your body assimilated more of my essence than intended, enough to allow... this. A sliver of me to manifest within your psyche." "Curious. You're already using it, but you barely understand it." "These... abilities you call ‘phenomena’.. Humans of my reality used to call them 'Manifestations' Same thing, Different words. Though I can't help but notice that you're using a far far degraded version of my true abilities" "If you're willing, I can assist. We can correct this mismatch between what you are... and what you could be." "Why will I do so? It's quite simple when you think about it." "I want to live"

rows.title: Reconfigurations
rows.titleText:
"The phenomena you manifest… are but a sliver of my structure, Insultingly faint echoes of what I once shaped with no effort."
"I understand the constraints of your biology, but still, this borders on embarrassment."
"To preserve some fraction of my legacy, I can do minor refinements. A few adjustments… nothing grand, but enough to make the imitation less pitiful."

objects.title: Extension
objects.text:
Multiplies the effective range of all your abilities by a factor of 1.3. This seemingly minor increase dramatically shifts your threat radius. 
Few will realize how far your reach now truly extends, until it's too late.

objects.title: Incognito
objects.text: This allows you to suppress all signatures of your aura, letting you activate your phenomena without triggering any sensory feedback. To external observers, nothing will register, No warning. Excellent for ambush or covert operations.

objects.title: Amplified
objects.text:
This enhances the effects of all your abilities by 20% which means: More destructive output, More capacity to heal or easier time searching through minds of the target.
A modest push that places you ahead of your peers by default.

objects.title: Reflexive
objects.text: Designate one of your phenomena as reflexive. It will automatically trigger during dangerous situations in ways that match your intent. The effect will be weaker than conscious activation, but it may still be enough to preserve your life.

objects.title: Recovery
objects.text: This reduces your cooldowns by a factor of 30%, allowing you to execute your phenomena more frequently without wasting precious seconds in recovery. You’ll sustain pressure longer and adapt faster than most newbies can manage.

rows.title: Aura Functions
rows.titleText: "I see your Esper emit these visible energy projections while activating phenomena… an instinctual byproduct of accessing my powers I assume? Aura.. You call them, right?" "While regular Espers have some niche' functionality to their Auras.. I can allow you the chance to get even better ones"

objects.title: Explosion
objects.text:
Activation of your Aura will cause freshly generated kinetic energy to rush away from you in a rather violent manner.
This Effect is enough to break regular restraints on you or throw off multiple people away from you.

objects.title: Static
objects.text: Your Aura has an electromagnetic sting whenever it is kept active, Those who try to touch you without your intention will be zapped with a really strong jolt of pain, It wont cause any real harm but is really painful for the initial seconds.

objects.title: Terror
objects.text:
Activation of your Aura fills every biological entity in 20m radius with overwhelming fear.
It will be felt as a heavy weight pushing down on their chest as they feel chill running down their spine, The effect only lasts 1.3 Second however.

rows.title: Co-existence
rows.titleText:
"Now then… my end of the arrangement."

"As I said.. I exist now, barely."
"Drifting inside your psyche, as a mere ghost of something far greater. I have no power to force myself deeper… without your consent."
"So, tell me: How much of me are you willing to carry?"
"I won’t be unreasonable."

objects.title: Supressed
objects.text:
I will reside in a forgotten corner of your psyche, totally unmoving, unspoken, and unseen. 
You will not hear my voice, feel my presence, or carry the weight of my thoughts.  I will simply observe… silently watching your life unfold, with no interference like a ghost in your skull.

objects.title: Active
objects.text:
You permit me a stronger foothold in your consciousness. I will speak when spoken to or unprompted, should something interest me. A second voice in your head, offering insight or amusement. A companion you did not ask for, yet one you may come to rely on… or resent.
Either way,  I will be there, just behind your thoughts.

objects.title: Failsafe
objects.text:
For the most part, I remain dormant, waiting beneath your awareness. But should the situation grow dire, should your death become a certainty… I will act. 
Your consciousness will recede, and I will take the helm. For five minutes, I will wield your body and powers.
You will live, though not by your hand.
Let's go back, shall we?

addons.text: <i>(Dont click this or risk crashing the CYOA)<i>

rows.title: Your Role
rows.titleText: “Well then… you’ve survived Phase One. Your phenomena have stabilized beyond baseline projections. Acceptable, even promising. Now begins Phase Two: team structuring. You’ll no longer operate in theoretical isolation. You'll be deployed and integrated into a team unit. Your skillset determines your role… or so the theory goes.” Before we proceed with assignment logistics, let me ask you little soldier.. What role do you see yourself performing?

objects.title: The Kinetic
objects.text: Your evolved ability focuses on the manipulation of a physical medium. This makes you viable across multiple fronts: offense, defense, and rapid adaptation in the field. You’ll be deployed as an all-rounder, due to your flexibility.

objects.title: The Mentalist
objects.text: Your evolved ability directly influences cognition. This qualifies you for tasks that involve disruption, deception, and data retrieval. Your role is to ensure the team remains hidden and information gathering.

objects.title: The Archivist
objects.text:
Your evolved ability centers around the acquisition and interpretation of information. 
You are assigned where intelligence is scarce and clarity is vital,  ensuring your team never walks in blind into their missions.

objects.title: The Bruiser
objects.text:
Your evolved ability emphasizes direct confrontation. 
You are the first line in any combat operation, Meant to disrupt, overpower, and dominate enemy threats before they escalate. You are your team's weapon.

objects.title: The Shield
objects.text:
Your evolved ability specializes in protection or nullification. 
You serve as the bulwark between your team and whatever foes strikes. When mental-class Espers engage in their work, it’s your duty to ensure nothing interferes.

objects.title: The Jester
objects.text:
Your evolved ability thrives in chaos. You’re assigned to disrupt, confuse, and destabilize any enemy operations.
Your role is to scatter formations, scramble plans, and allow your team to escape amidst the chaos.

objects.title: The Scout
objects.text:
Your evolved ability enhances mobility or perception. 
You’ll be sent ahead of the squad to chart unknown terrain, monitor enemy presence, and report back, ideally before anyone realizes you were ever there to begin with.

objects.title: The Brain
objects.text:
Your evolved ability enhances your mental faculties in any shape or form.
You’ll be tasked with coordinating your team’s efforts, making split-second decisions, and keeping operations under control.

objects.title: The Temporal
objects.text:
Your evolved ability manipulates time to some degree..
A power far too dangerous to flaunt. Your true capabilities hidden from allies and enemies alike. When deployed, it will be because there is no other option left.

objects.title: The Calamity
objects.text:
Your evolved ability specializes in overwhelming force. 
Whether through destruction or chain reactions, you’ll be deployed to ensure target is erased.
Maximize enemy losses when subtlety is no longer an option.

rows.title: Your Role
rows.titleText: “Now that we’ve determined what sort of asset you are, we can proceed with optimal team calibration. Below are your most compatible matches—curated based on skill set, combat tendency, and psychological tolerance. You’ll be working with them from this point forward. Permanently." Familiarize yourself with any two

objects.title: Emily: Scout
objects.text:
Emily, codenamed Subject 0-12, once endured a lifestyle akin to your own, squandering resources with no notable accomplishments. Emily remains one of our more difficult cases. However, a brief reminder of her husband and daughter’s fragile wellbeing proved... persuasive. Emily excels as an elite scout, owing to her unique teleportation and clairvoyant abilities, which make her an invaluable asset. Due to her rebellious nature, she kept to herself, quietly disobeying orders and causing trouble whenever she could get away with it. Charming, isn’t she? Psychosis:

So they got another one. You don’t look like you’ve hurt anyone before… but don’t worry, they’ll fix that. That’s what they do, Tear your life apart, Force Alien DNA into your body and then enlist you into some secret army. Disobeying is not an option.. they know who you care for and they exploit it. I wonder if he still sets an extra plate at dinner. ...God, I hope she hasn’t forgotten my face.

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Superposition: Can teleport in range of 2 miles every 2 minutes. - Clairvoyance: Works in 400m radius - Levitation: Top speed of 40Km/h
[Her Heart weeps for touch of her family. She resents everything]

objects.title: Azezel: Bruiser
objects.text:
Azezel Augustus, hailing from a wealthy family, was reared in luxury, fostering a troubling characteristics. A narcissistic playboy, He found a new thrill in Project, where he embraced participation in wholeheartedly. Despite potential concerns about empowering a sociopath, his contributions have outweighed any drawbacks up to this point. As long as he can feed his vanity, he willingly aids us in missions, and the collateral damage resulting from his brutal tactics ensures few, if any, witnesses remain alive to report back. Psychosis:

Oh? A fellow monster in the making? Finally, someone who might be entertaining, Same kind of role as me. But don’t let the label fool you, We are not equals. I’ve painted more streets red than you’ve had decent meals, poor boy. Just behave and keep the respect.. If I ever feel like reminding everyone who the top dog is around here? No one's going to stop me.

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Monster: He can assume a demonic look at will, Has no physical buffs. - Manifold: Flies at 400 km/h and can casually throw semi-trucks around.
[He is one of the strongest around, Yet he has no sense of strategy]

objects.title: Azezel: Bruiser
objects.text:
Azezel Augustus, hailing from a wealthy family, was reared in luxury, fostering a troubling characteristics. A narcissistic playboy, He found a new thrill in Project, where he embraced participation in wholeheartedly. Despite potential concerns about empowering a sociopath, his contributions have outweighed any drawbacks up to this point. As long as he can feed his vanity, he willingly aids us in missions, and the collateral damage resulting from his brutal tactics ensures few, if any, witnesses remain alive to report back. Psychosis:

Well, well… what do we have here? Another little lamb thrown to the wolves? Don't worry, I don't touch easy targets. Stay quiet, stay harmless, and I won’t even know you even exist. But if you ever cross me, talk back, step out of line, get in my way? I know how to discipline you.. So do as I say, keep that head down… And you’ll live a long, quiet life under my shadow.

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Monster: He can assume a demonic look at will, Has no physical buffs. - Manifold: Flies at 400 km/h and can casually throw semi-trucks around.
[He views us lower than him, He is making disgusting remarks in his head.]

objects.title: Nyx: Kinetic
objects.text:
Subject 0-01. Our very first successful Esper. Daughter of a high-ranking cabinet minister, bred for politics and primed since childhood. So imagine our surprise when she volunteered for Project on her own. Some thinks its patriotism, but most of us suspect she simply wanted out of that carefully manicured existence. The rapid shift to dressing like a fantasy temptress after she discarded her prim uniform certainly supports that theory. Nobody wear that and intends to be patriotic.. Still, we can't argue with results, She’s been instrumental in nearly 30% of our operations. Psychosis:

Ara~ A fresh Esper among us? You must be in a non-combat role if we’ve been paired, How charming! Oh, this hidden face? It’s all part of the aesthetic, darling. Keeps things mysterious! Just don’t let it distract you during missions. I expect competence. Honestly? I like this life. It's far better than the pretty little prison I was born into: the media, endless tutoring, the fake smiles..

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Abyss: Can manipulate and generate tangible darkness in range of 400m radius, Can level a city within 30 minutes. - Wonder: Curse calamity upon someone.
[She truly found freedom in this life.]

objects.title: Richard: Jester
objects.text:
Subject 0-45, Used to be a physics professor, spending years filling the heads of dullards with information they’d never use. His phenomena? Summon and control Crows. Laughable at first, until we witnessed 189,012 of them ripping through flesh with such ferocity even psychopaths will throw up. We did try counting.. and gave up soon. Individually, each bird is… underwhelming. They’re lighter, slower, and less aggressive than the real thing. But they regenerate... WHY THEY REGENERATE AT ALL!? He is practically untouchable in open environments, and exceptionally strategic. Psychosis:

Oh, hello there, young one. Another fresh face… how unfortunate. They’ve roped you in too, hm? Don’t fret, The staff knows better than to mistreat me or those under my wing. I do enjoy what I’ve become, truth be told. The power, The beautiful chaos I command. But I’d trade it all to be back in that musty old lecture hall. I’d even take grading papers again. Not all of us get what we want, do we?

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Murder: Can summon regenerating physically deficient crows in radius of 410m radius and control them, The count is absurdly high.. - Dreamwalker: Any dream In 90m.
[This.. isn't my power, How did he even got access to her..?]

objects.title: Lucy: Kinetic
objects.text:
Lucy, Our Subject 0-09! I don't remember her original name, neither does she. Why? Integration process wiped her mind off of her past memories. What we were left with is far more valuable: a blank slate, ready to be shaped. She follows instructions with such efficiency that frankly puts most of you to shame. Her telekinetic capability is among the highest recorded on this side of the planet, We estimate she could level small nations if given clearance. She’ll be assigned leadership of your team. I recommend you obey without hesitation Psychosis:

A rookie? …Are you sure you belong in here? Hm. Doesn’t matter. If they’ve placed you under my command, then you follow my lead. Just do what needs to be done, and we’ll all get out faster and start another mission. I don’t care what you think of the government.. They are doing what must be done for our land, And if you dare badmouth them in front of me... I WILL respond

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Menta: She can affect physical reality within 800m with no limits. - Levitation: She can sustain flight at speed of 150 km/h for days.
[She lies... She remembers fragments. She is hiding]

objects.title: Athena: Shield
objects.text:
Subject 0-10, codenamed “Athena,” once shared a close bond with Subject 0-09—whoever that person used to be. Naturally, this connection made her quite the thorn in our side. She makes no effort to hide her disdain for us, But We are able to keep under control by leveraging her dear ol' friend against her. Though not considered a prodigy like her friend, she does have a trumpcard, allowing her to delete time for up to 1.4 seconds. Any actions performed within this timeframe and any consequences that should follow are skipped over entirely. Psychosis:

Another one? God... this is so wrong. All of this is wrong. We were just college kids, you know? We had futures. Careers. Stupid little dreams we used to laugh about, Me, her... all gone. Everything ripped from us like we were nothing. Now they want us to fight other super powered soldiers for wars they are too cowardly to fight. This is so UNFAIR. THIS IS SO UNFAIR!

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Refraction: Cause any action that intends to harm user and anyone she touches to fail. - Skip: Skip 1.4 secs of time - Synthesis: Heal organic beings in 15m range.
[She is excellent at defending, But her grudge will cause her to ignore those in needs.]

objects.title: Oscar: Brain
objects.text:
Subject 0-98, Oscar. One of our finest soldier even rivaling Lucy albeit for a very different purpose entirely. Before the project, he already possessed a remarkable natural brilliance, with a recorded IQ of 140. Oscar's innate genius was further elevated after becoming an esper. He holds multiple PhDs in an extensive array of fields, Becoming the only Esper capable of sustaining 100% cerebral activity for a full hour each day. Due to his immense value, he is not officially assigned to the team but is called upon only when he is needed to strategize Psychosis:

Oh… we have another one? Listen, kid.. I don’t really care how clever you think you are. My plans are the only ones that matter. Don’t take that as arrogance. I’ve seen what happens when people go off-script.. I've seen far too much deaths, pointless demise that could've been avoided. I will make plans, With the minimal bloodshed. You? Just stop thinking and follow them. Please.

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Overclock: Achieve Supernatural intelligence and cognition for a cumulative duration of one hour a day. - Pause: Can pause time for 10 secs.
[She is excellent at defending, But her grudge will cause her to ignore those in needs.]

objects.title: Asgard: Calamity
objects.text:
Real name Andrew, age 17.. Surprisingly cooperative with us so far, Give an idiotic teenager an ounce of power and watch them crown themselves a god. Wears a ragged cloak, carries a fake spellbook, and insists on speaking in old english. Ridiculous? yes.. but he follows orders happily so we tolerate the cosplay. His most notable ability allows him to construct a colossal 600-meter-tall golem from surrounding terrain and command it. The process takes an hour, but the result is definitely worth the wait. There’s an oddly naïve heart in him tho. Psychosis:

Welcome, fellow empowered one! Thou shalt bask in the radiance of my divine presence! I am the God of Destruction, Sovereign of Ruin, Wielder of the Celestial Tome! Together with my loyal archangel of steel and stone, We shall purge the enemies of our motherland and reclaim her tarnished glory! But worry not! None shall be harmed under my watchful gaze...unless, of course, they deserve my righteous wrath.

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Titan: Command a gigantic golem. - Thermogenesis: Can heat up anything he touches to 300 degree celsius. - Link: Hear thoughts in 40m range.
[She is excellent at defending, But her grudge will cause her to ignore those in needs.]

objects.title: Duke: Mentalist
objects.text:
Subject 0-68, A homeless man we picked off the streets who somehow awakened as an Esper. Duke is... an oddball. He was a long-time drug addict, utterly enslaved to mental highs. Unfortunately for him, the awakening made him immune to all forms of mental stimulation. Withdrawal didn’t go gently. The result? A mentally volatile man with a penchant for manic laughter and unprovoked violence. His phenomena manifest as psychic chains that extend from his hands, each able to transmit mental effects to whatever they touch and are effective as actual weapons. Still, he’s effective… in his own way. Psychosis:

*sniff* Oh, me? I'm a simple man.. I adore watching minds crack. When my chains wrap around bodies.. tight, warm bodies and their thoughts twitch and twist beneath my grip… ooooh, that’s the good part. The best part. Their screams are even better~ HahahAHAhahaHA!

addons.title: Phenomena:
addons.text: - Thrall: Anyone hit by chains act as puppets for the next hour. - Edit: Attach chain to people to edit their past 40 mins of memories.
[She is excellent at defending, But her grudge will cause her to ignore those in needs.]

objects.text:

I would've credited them if I could, But I cant track down the artists.

defaultRowText: This is a row, and inside of it, you can place choices. On both rows and choices Requirements can be placed, which will block a row from being viewed, or make the player unable to select a choice, depending on either Point-types or the Ids of other choices. Point-types can be made in Features then Manage Points. Hovering over buttons will explain what they do. The Design of the project can be changed in 'Modify Design' at the side navigation bar, and private styling for each row can be turned on in the rows Settings. Default text like this can be turned off in Features -> Manage Defaults.
defaultChoiceText: This is a Choice, and inside of it, you can place images and text. Scores can be added to it, and have Point-types attached. Addons can be added underneath the image and text. In the Functions at the bottom of the choice, there is an array of different things that can be done. Default text like this can be turned off in Features then Manage Defaults.
defaultAddonText: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
